column5: Fellow Fisherman - beer slayer ( Kenny) here. Myself and the little Women will be heading to the Attwood central cabin first of August. This is our third trip with Mattice, having fished Guerin Lake twice. We wanted a new experience, so decided on a bigger Lake. I have done well fishing in current, but not so hot on just a Lake. Was hoping anyone that has fished Attwood, or who could offer tips on this River system could give me some pointers. Thanks guys! Wishing you all a good, safe fishing season. Kenny
Hey Kenny, you're bringing a bunch of women with you? (you used the plural form of the word).Who cares about the fishing??
Mike, Stay focused....stay focused !!!! Remember that mid lake humps are not always your friend PjShorthorn

I have been fishing Attwood for several years, even before Mattice purchased it. You will find great fishing on the west end of the small island in front of your cabin. If you head west from your camp, there are a couple of islands on the north side of the lake that is also very good. If you go to the NE end of the lake, there is a small channel (watch for rocks) that opens up and has good fishing on the north side. At one time there was a cabin on that end of the lake, but it is no longer there. My group will be staying at the west camp over Labor Day. I hope you have a great trip. Bfgilly
Bumping this back up. Any fellow fishermen who have fished Attwood? Appreciate all info. Thanks Beer Slayer/ Kenny
Hey beerslayer, I sent you a message asking about Guerin lake?!
auwookie - Got it! Check your PM
